import { useRef } from 'react'; import classNames from 'classnames/bind'; import styles from '../GlobalCSS/Global.module.scss'; import styleModal from '../GlobalCSS/GlobalModal.module.scss'; function Product() { const cx = classNames.bind({ ...styles, ...styleModal }); const myModal = useRef(null); const handleAddProduct = () => { myModal.current.classList.remove(styleModal.active); }; const handleCloseModal = () => { myModal.current.classList.add(styleModal.active); }; return (
